name: Oluwafemi Olukoya
content: Oluwafemi Olukoya - Queen's University Belfast View Scopus Profile Oluwafemi Olukoya Dr Lecturer, School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2771-2553 Phone+44 (0)28 9097 4652Emailo.olukoyaqub.acuk Room 03.028 - Computer Science BuildingUnited Kingdom Accepting PhD Students 20192025 Research activity per year Personal profile Research InterestsMy core research interests include privacy, malware analysis, systems security and cybercrime. My current research focuses on mobile systems security and privacy, sustainable malware analysis and detection engineering, cyber-attack attribution and connecting software engineering with legal and regulatory requirements. I am also interested in multidisciplinary research projects that capture the socio-technical dynamics of the cyber environment.
